participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys social interactions and making new friends.
participant_1.background: My father used to work for a bank. I live in the city. I went to college and graduated few years ago. Now I also work at a bank.

participant_2.name: Emma Carter
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, with a passion for literature and arts.
participant_2.background: My parents have been married for 40 years. I love to read. My favorite movie is Goodfellas. I enjoy watching football and hockey games. I am a proofreader for a greeting card company.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a proofreader for a greeting card company.
Oh, that sounds interesting! Do you enjoy it?
I do, it's a lot of fun. I get to read all sorts of different things, and I get to be creative with my editing.
That's great. What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is Goodfellas. I love the characters, the story, and the way it's shot.
I've heard good things about that movie, I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should. It's a classic.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, watch movies, and go to concerts.
We have a lot in common! I love to read, watch movies, and go to concerts too.
That's great! Maybe we can go to a concert together sometime.
I would love that! I know a great venue in the city that has a lot of good shows.
That sounds like fun. I'm free next weekend, if you are.
I'm free too! Let's do it.
